= VimWiki =
<Shift-Enter>Split and follow link
<Shift -Enter> Split and follow/create wiki link
<Ctrl-Enter> Vertical split follow and create wiki link
<Backspace>  Go back to parent(previous) wiki link
<Tab>  Find next wikilink.
<Shift-Tab> Find previous wikilink
<Leader>wd	: Deletes the wiki you are in
<Leader>wr	: Renames the file you are in
:h vimwiki-commands  : lists all commands
